      • recordProductsDb

        public void recordProductsDb()

      • recordProduction

        public void recordProduction()
        Record Production Button records to the production log and outputs it to the text area

        Get the selected product from the Product Line ListView and the quantity from the comboBox. Create an ArrayList of ProductionRecord objects named productionRun. ***************** Send the productionRun arraylist to an addToProductionDB method.

      • addToProductionDb

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - exception

      • loadProductionLog

        public void loadProductionLog()
